body:
@josevalim Hahaha :D look: https://github.com/apotonick/cells/blob/0ed0542e1553af731bbb8cd8e5352a3e9e6c6d24/lib/cell/base.rb#L53 We already use this approach so I thought it might be a nice touch to push that into the core.

I strongly disagree in removing #prepare only because it "just" includes an array of modules - in the reverse order, BTW, another thing to know if you'd remove the method. Think of it from another perspective: What if ActionView would be completely decoupled from Rails (which would be awesome) but still contains knowledge about `url_helpers`, `routes` and the like? That would increase complexity where we could easily reduce it using the proposed approach.
